activities:
Boonty is a pioneering video game catalog and middleware platform solution providing everything needed to find, purchase, and deliver video games simply and securely to customers over the Internet.
Boonty has built a foundation for uniting game publishers looking to expand their markets, and online audience makers (ISPs, Portals, e-tailers) looking to offer quality content and value added services and thus generate revenue.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
